**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Valerie (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2402) **Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 83 **Perception** +16; (master) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +12, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +11, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11 **Str** +4 **Dex** +1 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +3 **Items** [Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [bastard sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15)_, [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), lesser elixirs of life, [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), [+1 resilient full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13), [moderate juggernaut mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=94), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), ring of fire resistance, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows)_, [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (3), [lesser sturdy shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327) (Hardness 10, HP 80, BT 40), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +15 **Will** +15 **HP** 134 **Resistances** fire 5 **[Aggressive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=363)**
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360)**
**[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _bastard sword_ +20 ([two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 2d8+7 slashing **Ranged** _composite shortbow_ +15 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d8+2 piercing **Power Attack** **Ancestry Feats** [Cooperative Nature](/Feats.aspx?ID=67), [Natural Ambition](/Feats.aspx?ID=70) ([Power Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=359)), [Natural Skill](/Feats.aspx?ID=71) (Diplomacy, Society) **Class Feats** [Aggressive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=363), [Power Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=359), [Powerful Shove](/Feats.aspx?ID=373), [Quick Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=394), [Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360), [Shield Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=229) **General Feats** [Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=774), [Fleet](/Feats.aspx?ID=784), [Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32), [Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855) **Skill Feats** [Cat Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=765), [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796), [Intimidating Prowess](/Feats.aspx?ID=797), [Quick Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=825), [Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854) **Class Abilities** Attack of Opportunity, Battlefield Surveyor, Bravery, Combat Flexibility, Fighter Weapon Mastery (sword), Juggernaut, Shield Block, Weapon Specialization
name: Valerie (Level 9)
